parameters.name: Keyword
parameters.description: The keyword for the endpoint name. A fuzzy search is performed.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the response. Valid values:

- zh: Chinese.

- en: English.

Default value: en

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The page number for a paged query. The value starts from 1. The default value is 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. The maximum value is 100. The default value is 20.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description:
The status of the endpoint. Valid values:

- SUCCESS: The endpoint is working as expected.

- INIT: The endpoint is being created.

- FAILED: The endpoint failed to be created.

- CHANGE\_INIT: The endpoint is being modified.

- CHANGE\_FAILED: The endpoint failed to be modified.

- EXCEPTION: The endpoint is not working as expected.

> If you do not specify this parameter, endpoints in all states are returned. If you specify this parameter, only endpoints in the specified state are returned.

parameters.name: VpcRegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the region where the outbound virtual private cloud (VPC) is located.
